name: Cardcaptor Sakura: Itsumo Sakura-Chan to Issho!
overview: Cardcaptor Sakura: Itsumo Sakura-chan to Issho! is an Adventure game developed and published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 1999. The goal is to collect all of the missing Clow cards by finding Sakura in her house, talking to her, and coaxing her to go on adventures. But in order to do that, you need to be in the right place at the right time, as the game utilizes an internal real-time clock.
